descriptions:
["DescriptionCandour Real Estate Broker LLC is pleased to offer this exquisitely furnished 5 bedroom Atrium entry villa located on Frond D for sale in Palm Jumeirah, Dubai. 
Property Features:
- Area: 6,701 Sq.ft.
- 5 Bedrooms all with an en suites
- Triple floor Atrium Entry
- Personal Gym & Sports Room 
- Swimming Pool & Beach Access
- Maids room
- Double Garage
- Burj Al Arab Views
- Ready to move in
This exclusive villa is one of the most in-demand types of villa on the Palm. On the ground floor, there is a large living area, a private gym, an entertainment area with pool and tennis tables, a study, a kitchen, and a maid's room. The 1st floor consists of 4 spacious bedrooms, all with en-suite bathrooms and on the the 2nd floor there is a master bedroom. The villa is very well maintained and fully equipped and furnished according to the highest standards. The outdoor area is landscaped and has a barbecue area, and a big swimming pool. The villa features spectacular views of Burj Al Arab. 
To schedule a viewing please call on +971528866288.
Candour Real Estate Broker is one of the leading service companies specializing in the brokerage of residential and commercial properties, with an experience of more than a decade, having its presence in Dubai, Georgia and India.
Candour Real Estate Broker LLC
RERA ORN: 2490
www.candourproperty.com"]
